channel.title: Introductie on Beleid, but pirrrrates
channel.description: Recent content in Introductie on Beleid, but pirrrrates

item.title: Samenhangrrr
item.description: Arrr! Pirrrates Fello' pirrates, be awarrre some stuff may not work fer us in this trrranslat'n. Like table of rrramblings, see'ng Merrrmaids, do'ng math or chemistrrry and stuff. Het informatiebeveiligingsbeleid bestaat uit vier niveaus 1 1. L1: Strategisch beleid 2. L2: Tactisch informatiebeveiligingsbeleid 3. L3: Tactisch-Operationele standaarden 4. L4: Werkinstructies L1 be definitief, L2 t/m L4 zijn 'n revisie. Dit betekent echter niet dat er geen beleid be, deze be echter toe aan vernieuw'n.

item.title: Wijzigingshistorie
item.description: Arrr! Pirrrates Fello' pirrates, be awarrre some stuff may not work fer us in this trrranslat'n. Like table of rrramblings, see'ng Merrrmaids, do'ng math or chemistrrry and stuff. Break'n A change that requires act'n by ye aft upgrad'n t' assure th' ship be still functional. Change A change 'n default behavior. This may requires act'n by ye / may or may not be revert'ble by configurat'n. New Marks new behavior ye might find interest'n or comes configur'ble.
